content: Which famous inventor and businessman founded Apple Inc. alongside Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne in 1976?

I believe you're referring to Steve Jobs. He, along with Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne, co-founded Apple Inc. in 1976. Steve Jobs was not only a co-founder but also played a pivotal role in the company's growth and success over the years. His innovative vision and leadership were instrumental in making Apple one of the most valuable and influential technology companies in the world.
